de.codecentric.boot.admin.server.services

类 StatusUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.codecentric.boot.admin.server.services.StatusUpdater

  • public class StatusUpdater
extends Object
    The StatusUpdater is responsible for updating the status of all or a single application querying the healthUrl.
    作者:
    Johannes Edmeier
